d: Aaron is an athletic shirt or tank top.

s.cutArmBinding.t: The arm opening knit binding is not shown
s.cutArmBinding.d: The **Arm opening knit binding** are two strips of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long (this includes seam allowance). They are not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutNeckBinding.t: The neck opening knit binding is not shown
s.cutNeckBinding.d: The **Neck opening knit binding** is a strip of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long (this includes seam allowance). It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutOneStripToFinishTheNeckOpening: Cut one strip to finish the neck opening
s.cutTwoStripsToFinishTheArmholes: Cut two strips to finish the armholes
s.largeSaAdaptKnitBindingWidth.t: Consider lowering the knit binding width
s.largeSaAdaptKnitBindingWidth.d:
The default width of the knit binding is 6 times the seam allowance. Because your chosen seam allowance ({{{ sa }}}) is larger than the 1cm used when designing the pattern, your knit binding is likely to be too wide. 

You can lower the knit binding width to compensate for your larger seam allowance.

armholeDrop.d: Lower the armhole by this amount. Negative values will raise it.

backlineBend.d: Determines the shape/bend of the back of the armholes.

hipsEase.d: The amount of ease at your hips.

knitBindingWidth.d: Controls the width of the knit binding as a percentage of the chosen seam allowance, or 1cm if no seam allowance is used.

necklineBend.d: Determines the shape/bend of the neckline at the front.

necklineDrop.d: The amount the neck is cutout at the front.

shoulderStrapPlacement.d: Determines whether the shoulder strap is placed closer to the neck (lower numbers) or the shoulder (higher numbers).

shoulderStrapWidth.d: The width of the shoulder straps.
